verbs.description: WASHINGTON ( AP ) — The Latest on the resolution of the AT&T - Time Warner antitrust case ( all times local):9:55 p.m . A federal judge [V: has] approved the $ 85 billion mega - merger of AT&T and Time Warner , potentially ushering in a wave of media consolidation while shaping how much consumers pay for streaming TV and movies . U.S. District Judge Richard Leon green - lit the merger without imposing major conditions as some experts had expected . The Trump Justice Department had sued to block the $ 85 billion merger , arguing it would hurt competition in cable and satellite TV and jack up costs to consumers for streaming TV and movies . Now , the phone and pay - TV giant AT&T will be allowed to absorb the owner of CNN , HBO , the Warne
